definition: Acridoidea (family containing grasshoppers, crickets and locusts)
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]
Gryllolaptaptidae family of burrowing insects of order Orthoptera/mole crickets
Orthoptera (insect order including grasshoppers, crickets and locusts)
Hemiptera (suborder of order Homoptera, insects including cicadas and aphids)
Homoptera (insect suborder including cicadas, aphids, plant-hoppers, shield bugs etc)
Cuculiformes, order of birds including cuckoo
Annelidan, the phylum of annelid worms
Class Trematoda/fluke/trematode worm, a parasite incl. on humans
Cicadidae, homopterous insect family including cicada
Odonata, order consisting of about 6,000 species of dragonflies and damselflies
Hymenoptera (insect order including ants and bees)
(bird species of China) white-bellied woodpecker (Dryocopus javensis)
